questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A white flower
C) A group of people
D) A building

B) A white flower with other plants in the background
C) A busy street
D) A family gathering

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A white flower
C) A person
D) A building

A) Grass
B) A white flower and green leaves
C) A bench
D) A car

A) A mountain
B) A house and more plants
C) A lake
D) A cityscape

B) Yellow
C) White
D) Blue

D) Spiky

D) Four
